ThingDef.label: clannfear
ThingDef.description: A medium-sized reptile that has mutated under the influence of unknown factors.

ThingDef.label: Doerd
ThingDef.description: A creature of unknown origin, believed to have undergone severe mutations. Almost the entire body is covered with horny growths and bone formations.

ThingDef.label: shalk
ThingDef.description: A creeping insect, on which you can often find mushrooms growing directly on the shell.

ThingDef.label: alit
ThingDef.description: Large carnivorous reptile that lives in desert lands. It has a strange appearance, which hints at susceptibility to mutations in the past.

ThingDef.label: wormmouth
ThingDef.description: A two-legged creature with an oblong mouth.

ThingDef.Name: VvardvarkBase
ThingDef.label: vvardvark
ThingDef.description: A strange creature that resembles a cross between a zebra and a reptile.

ThingDef.label: chocobo
ThingDef.description: A large and rather peaceful bird that lives in lands remote from predators.

ThingDef.label: chocobo egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized chocobo egg.

ThingDef.label: Hyena
ThingDef.description: Hyena is a canine species found in arid lands and deserts. It is mainly a scavenger.

ThingDef.label: MuskOx
ThingDef.description: Representative of the northern fauna. It feeds on moss and rare plants deep under the snow.

ThingDef.label: axolotl
ThingDef.description: A small animal, the peculiarity of which is that it is, in fact, a sexually mature larva of another creature.

ThingDef.label: crystalotl
ThingDef.description: An unusual type of axolotl, transformed as a result of life in an extremely salty environment.

ThingDef.label: giant snail
ThingDef.description: A huge snail for its kind, leading a peaceful lifestyle.

ThingDef.label: Crystalope
ThingDef.description: A cow-like creature overgrown with crystalline salt spikes.

ThingDef.label: Foxer
ThingDef.description: Presumably it is a species of fox mutated as a result of the disaster.

ThingDef.label: Butterfly vampire
ThingDef.description: A giant butterfly that feeds on animal meat. Differs in aggressiveness.

ThingDef.label: Opossum
ThingDef.description: A small mammal that belongs to the marsupials. Usually non-aggressive.

ThingDef.label: Crystalk
ThingDef.description: A subspecies of the Vvardvark, characterized by living conditions in an extremely salty environment, and also having spiked growths on its back.

ThingDef.label: Crystabara
ThingDef.description: A subspecies of Capybara living in a salty environment.

ThingDef.label: Crystalix
ThingDef.description: A subspecies of Capybara living in a salty environment.

ThingDef.label: Arachnoid
ThingDef.description: Large for their species spiders that prey on small animals.

ThingDef.label: eyeling
ThingDef.description: A radioactive life form that lives against all odds.

ThingDef.label: woolly horse
ThingDef.description: The coat of this horse has excellent thermal insulation, which allows it to live in the conditions of the far north.

ThingDef.label: dark ibex
ThingDef.description: A black ibex that lives in the plains of volcanic fields. Extremely explosive.

ThingDef.label: dark hare
ThingDef.description: A black hare that lives in the plains of volcanic fields. Extremely explosive.

ThingDef.label: dark yak
ThingDef.description: A black yak that lives in the plains of volcanic fields. Extremely explosive.

ThingDef.label: Zion
ThingDef.description: A furry herbivore mutated by radiation. Probably the ancestor of the creature is an ungulate animal, like a cow.

ThingDef.label: Poisonous toad
ThingDef.description: A desert toad that lives near small wet areas. Poisonous and extremely dangerous.

ThingDef.label: Cockatoo
ThingDef.description: Tropical bird that lives in humid forests.

ThingDef.label: Cockatoo egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized cockatoo egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Cockatoo egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized cockatoo egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby cockatoo. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Hornbill
ThingDef.description: Tropical bird that lives in humid forests. Good for learning.

ThingDef.label: Hornbill egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Hornbill egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Hornbill egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Hornbill egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Hornbill. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Toucan
ThingDef.description: Tropical bird that lives in humid forests.

ThingDef.label: Toucan egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Toucan egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Toucan egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Toucan egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Toucan. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Parrot
ThingDef.description: Tropical bird that lives in humid forests.

ThingDef.label: Parrot egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Parrot egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Parrot egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Parrot egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Parrot. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Vulture
ThingDef.description: A bird of deserts and steppes that eats corpses.

ThingDef.label: Vulture egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Vulture egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Vulture egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Vulture egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Vulture. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Owl
ThingDef.description: Forest hunter eating small animals.

ThingDef.label: Owl egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Owl egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Owl egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Owl egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Owl. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Crow
ThingDef.description: Forest bird eating small animals, worms and seeds.

ThingDef.label: Crow egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Crow egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Crow egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Crow egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Crow. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Kestrel
ThingDef.description: A hunter bird that prefers to live in moderately hot regions of the planet.

ThingDef.label: Kestrel egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Kestrel egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Kestrel egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Kestrel egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Kestrel. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Ferrus
ThingDef.description: Large pangolin with a strong, partially organic shell.

ThingDef.label: Ibrex
ThingDef.description: A large bird that lives in warm tropical latitudes. It feeds on plant foods and is usually not aggressive.

ThingDef.label: Ibrex egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Ibrex egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Ibrex egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Ibrex egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Ibrex. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Huge spider
ThingDef.description: A large and aggressive spider that feeds on small animals or carcasses.

ThingDef.label: Saber-toothed leopard
ThingDef.description: A large snow predator with huge and sharp fangs.

ThingDef.label: Giant shrew
ThingDef.description: A mutated mammal with tentacles on its face.

ThingDef.label: Python
ThingDef.description: A large snake with no venom glands.

ThingDef.label: Python egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized Python egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Python egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized Python egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Python. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: Grass snake
ThingDef.description: A small and harmless snake for humans, which will not be the first to show aggression.

ThingDef.label: GrassSnake egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized GrassSnake egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: GrassSnake egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized GrassSnake egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby GrassSnake. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
